action.action-desc: Mr. Schrader (for himself and Ms. Herrera Beutler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To provide for statutes of limitations for certain civil actions under the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Halting Of Mortgage Exploitation of Servicemembers Act of 2017 or the HOMES Act of 2017.

section.header: Statutes of limitations for civil actions under Servicemembers Civil Relief Act

subsection.text: Section 801 of the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act (50 U.S.C. 4041) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
Any action under subsection (a) shall be commenced not later than ten years after the date on which the alleged violation occurs.
Section 802 of such Act (50 U.S.C. 4042) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
Any action commenced under this section shall be barred unless the complaint is filed within ten years after the right of action first accrues.
